actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code by increasing the personal exemption from $750 to $1,000, to provide that a taxpayer may elect a credit in the amount of $300 for each personal exemption to which he is entitled in lieu of taking a deduction for each such exemption.

summary.text: Increases the personal exemption under the Internal Revenue Code from $750 to $1,000. Provides that a taxpayer may elect a credit in the amount of $300 for each personal exemption to which he is entitled in lieu of taking a deduction for each such exemption. Increases the amounts of the withholding exemptions with respect to the percentage method of withholding income taxes at the source.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code by increasing the personal exemption from $750 to $1,000, to provide that a taxpayer may elect a credit in the amount of $300 for each personal exemption to which he is entitled in lieu of taking a deduction for each such exemption.
